hadiths.text: Ibn ‘Umar said :The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) led us in prayer and gave the salutation after two rakahs of prayer. He narrated this tradition like that of Ibn Sirin from Abu Hurairah. This version adds; he gave the salutation and prostrated two prostrations due to forgetfulness

chapter.eng-name: (Prostrating For) Forgetfulness After The Two Prostrations (Rak'ah)
